title: Hackathon 2025 Kick-off
description: Join us for the opening ceremony of our annual hackathon. Keynote speakers and problem statements will be revealed.

title: Startup Pitch Competition
description: Pitch your startup idea to a panel of venture capitalists and industry experts. Exciting prizes to be won!

title: Tech Club Recruitment Drive
description: Looking for passionate developers and designers to join our core team. Come talk to us and show us your projects!
